<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Know the Enemy](/Spells.aspx?ID=428)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 393 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=17)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** You roll initiative and can see a creature, you succeed at an attack roll against a creature, or a creature fails a saving throw against one of your spells.

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Use a Recall Knowledge action, rolling the appropriate skill check to identify the triggering creature's abilities. You can roll your check twice and use the better result.
name: Know the Enemy
